page.title: 17A Boarder's Life at School
page.content: At 7.15 matron came over and woke us up in the dormitory by putting the lights on.We made our beds and washed ourselves.When we were dressed the prefect told us to go to our classroom.At 7.55 we walked upto breakfast in the school dinning hall and had cereal and something cooked. At ten to nine we went to our classroom and had registration.and lessons.After school we went back to the boarding house and got changed into casuals,then we went and watched television until teatime. After tea we had prep until 7.00 then we went swimming.At 8.30 we had to go back down to the boarding house and get changed for bed. Kevin Humes
